Ability.Name: Initial
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_CuteOne.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_CuteOne.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
------VARIABLES------ t = "target" p = "player" foc = "focus" gsi = GetSpellInfo cast = CastSpellByName cd = GetSpellCooldown cp = GetComboPoints(p) ub = UnitBuff ubid = UnitBuffID ua = UnitAura udb = UnitDebuff udbid = UnitDebuffID pow = UnitPower(p) hastar = UnitExists(t) canattack = UnitCanAttack(p,t) sir = IsSpellInRange incom = UnitAffectingCombat(p)==1 outcom = UnitAffectingCombat(p)~=1 php = 100*(UnitHealth(p)/UnitHealthMax(p)) thp = 100*(UnitHealth(t)/UnitHealthMax(t)) tthp = UnitHealthMax(t) maxpow = UnitPowerMax(p) powper = 100*(pow/maxpow) pchannel = select(8,UnitChannelInfo(p)) pcasting = (UnitCastingInfo(p) and select(9,UnitCastingInfo(p))) tchannel = select(8,UnitChannelInfo(t)) tcasting = (UnitCastingInfo(t) and select(9,UnitCastingInfo(t))) if select(6,UnitCastingInfo(t))~=nil then tcasttime = (select(6,UnitCastingInfo(t))/1000)-GetTime() else tcasttime = 0 end uc = UnitClassification(t) ul = UnitLevel if (ul(t)==-1 or ul(t)>=(ul(p)-10)) and (uc=="worldboss" or uc=="rareelite" or uc=="elite" or uc=="rare") then BossCheck = false else BossCheck = false end
------Abilities------ ag = 108281 --Ancestral Guidance as = 2008 --Ancestral Spirit asc = 114049 --Ascendance asw = 16188 --Ancestral Swiftness ar = 556 --Astral Recall ass = 108271 --Astral Shift be = 76780 --Bind Elemental bf = 33697 --Blood Fury (Orc Racial) ch = 1064 --Chain Heal cl = 421 --Chain Lightning cs = 51886 --Cleanse Spirit eb = 117014 --Elemental Blast em = 16166 --Elemental Mastery es = 8042 --Earth Shock gon = 59547 --Gift of the Naaru far = 6196 --Far Sight fer = 51533 --Feral Spirit fn = 1535 --Fire Nova fs = 8050 --Flame Shock frs = 8056 --Frost Shock gw = 2645 --Ghost Wolf hr = 73920 --Healing Rain hs = 8004 --Healing Surge her = 32182 --Heroism hex = 51514 --Hex ll = 60103 --Lava Lash lb = 403 --Lightning Bolt ls = 324 --Lightning Shield prg = 370 --Purge sb = 115356 --Stormblast sr = 30823 --Shamanistic Rage sw = 58875 --Spirit Walk sg = 79206 --Spiritwalker's Grace ss = 17364 --Stormstrike tp = 108287 --Totemic Projection tr = 36936 --Totemic Recall ue = 73680 --Unleash Elements uf = 117012 --Unleashed Fury ws = 52127 --Water Shield ww = 546 --Water Walking wsh = 57994 --Wind Shear
------Totems------ ---Air ct = 108269 --Capacitor Totem gt = 8177 --Grounding Totem st = 120668 --Stormlash Totem wt = 108273 --Windwalk Totem _, air = GetTotemInfo(4) if air == gsi(ct) or air == gsi(gt) or air == gsi(st) or air == gsi(wt) then hasair = true atr = GetTotemTimeLeft(4) else hasair = false atr = 0 end
---Earth et = 2484 --Earthbind Totem tt = 8143 --Tremor Totem eet = 2062 --Earth Elemental Totem _, earth = GetTotemInfo(2) if earth == gsi(et) or earth == gsi(tt) or earth == gsi(eet) then hasearth = true etr = GetTotemTimeLeft(2) else hasearth = false etr = 0 end
---Fire fet = 2894 --Fire Elemental Totem mt = 8190 --Magma Totem srt = 3599 --Searing Totem _, fire = GetTotemInfo(1) if fire == gsi(fet) or fire == gsi(mt) or fire == gsi(srt) then hasfire = true ftr = GetTotemTimeLeft(1) else hasfire = false ftr = 0 end
---Water hst = 5394 --Healing Stream Totem _, water = GetTotemInfo(3) if water == gsi(hst) then haswater = true wtr = GetTotemTimeLeft(3) else haswater = false wtr = 0 end
------Weapon Imbues------ local mh, mhr, _, oh, ohr = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() if mh==nil then hasmh = false else hasmh = true end if oh==nil then hasoh = false else hasoh = true end wfw = 8232 --Windfury Weapon ftw = 8024 --Flametongue Weapon fbw = 8033 --Frostbrand Weapon rbw = 8017 --Rockbiter Weapon
------Buffs/Debuffs/Procs------ ufl = 73683 --Unleashed Flame mw = 53817 --Maelstrom Weapon sf = 77657 --Searing Flames ex = 57723 --Exhaustion asb = 114051 --Ascendance Buff mwstack = select(4,ubid(p,mw)) if mwstack == nil then mwc = 0 else mwc = mwstack end
sfstack = select(4,ubid(p,sf)) if sfstack == nil then sfc = 0 else sfc = sfstack end
inMelee = IsSpellInRange(gsi(ll), t) if inMelee == nil or inMelee == 0 then inMelee = false else inMelee = true end
fstimeer = select(4,udbid(t,fs,p)) if fstimer == nil then fsr = 0 else fsr = fstimer end
exhausted = select(4,ubid(p,ex)) if exhausted == nil then nohero = 0 else nohero = exhausted end
if GetSpellBookItemInfo(uf,"SPELL")==nil then hasuf = false else hasuf = true end
-- CD Switch if PQ_CDMode==nil then PQ_CDMode = "Boss" end if IsRightControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_CDTimer > 1 then PQ_CDTimer = GetTime()
if not PQ_CD then PQ_CD = CD_BossOnly PQ_CDMode = "Boss" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff79BAECBoss Only|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif PQ_CD == CD_BossOnly then PQ_CD = CD_Auto PQ_CDMode = "On" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff006400On|cffffffff", "Notice") else PQ_CD = false PQ_CDMode = "Off" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143COff|cffffffff", "Notice") end end
-- AoE/Single Switch if AOEMode == nil then AOEMode = 0 end if PQ_Rot == nil then PQ_Rot = "Single" end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_AOETimer > 1 then PQ_AOETimer = GetTime()
if PQ_AOE then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 0 PQ_Rot = "Single" PQR_SwapRotation("Enhance PvE (CuteOne)") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143CSingle|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif AOEMode==0 then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 1 PQ_Rot = "Hybrid" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff79BAECHybrid|cffffffff", "Notice") elseif AOEMode==1 then PQ_AOE = true AOEMode = 2 PQ_Rot = "Multi" PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff006400Multi|cffffffff", "Notice") PQR_SwapRotation("Enhance AoE PvE (CuteOne)") end end
PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'CD-Mode: '..PQ_CDMode..' --- '..'AOE-Mode: '..PQ_Rot)

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or ubid(p,gw) or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",5384) or UnitInVehicle("player") or UnitIsDead("target") or UnitIsDead("player") or UnitBuffID("player", 77769) or (not UnitAffectingCombat("player") and not sir(gsi(ss),t)==1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Shield and Weapons
Ability.Lua:
------Shields Up------ if not IsMounted() then if powper>=25 and not ubid(p,ls) and not ubid(p,ws) then cast(gsi(ls)) end if powper < 25 and not ubid(p,ws) then cast(gsi(ws)) end if powper > 75 and ubid(p,ws) then cast(gsi(ls)) end
------Weapons Online-----
if hasmh == false then cast(gsi(wfw), p) end if hasoh == false then cast(gsi(ftw), p) end end

Ability.Name: Totem Management
Ability.Lua:
if outcom and hasfire==true and not UnitExists(t) then totemX,totemY = 0,0 cast(gsi(tr)) end --if incom and sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 then -- if AoE == false then -- if hasfire==false and cd(fet) > 0 then -- cast(gsi(srt)) -- end -- if fire == gsi(mt) then -- cast(gsi(tr)) -- end -- end -- if AoE == true then -- if hasfire==false then -- cast(gsi(mt)) -- end -- if fire == gsi(srt) then -- cast(gsi(tr)) -- end -- end --end
if incom and sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 then if AoE == false then if hasfire==false and cd(fet) > 0 then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(srt)) end if fire == gsi(mt) or totemDistance() > 17 then totemX,totemY = 0,0 cast(gsi(tr)) end end if AoE == true then if hasfire==false then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(mt)) end if fire == gsi(srt) or totemDistance() > 4 then totemX,totemY = 0,0 cast(gsi(tr)) end end end
if incom and check(st) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(st)) end if incom and check(eet) and cd(fet) > 0 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(eet)) end if incom and check(fet) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(fet)) end

Ability.Name: Interrupt
Ability.Lua: --if incom and check(gt) and cd(gsi(wsh))~=0 and Interruptable(t,gt) then -- cast(gsi(gt)) --end if incom and check(wsh) and Interruptable(t,wsh) then cast(gsi(wsh),t) end

Ability.Name: Ascendance
Ability.Lua: if check(asc) and not ubid(p,asb) and sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(asc)) end

Ability.Name: Defensive
Ability.Lua: if check(sr) then cast(gsi(sr)) end if php<=80 and cd(gsi(gon))==0 then cast(gsi(gon),p) end if php<=75 and check(hst) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(hst)) end if php<=50 and mwc==5 then cast(gsi(hs)) end if php<=30 and check(ass) then cast(gsi(ass)) end if php<=25 and cd(ag)==0 then cast(gsi(ag)) end if php<=25 and cd(fer)==0 then cast(gsi(fer)) end

Ability.Name: Racials
Ability.Lua: if check(bf) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(bf)) end

Ability.Name: Unleash Elements
Ability.Lua: if pow>=820 and check(ue) and inMelee==true then cast(gsi(ue)) end

Ability.Name: Chain Lightning
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode~=0 and pow>=12200 and mwc==5 and check(cl) then cast(gsi(cl)) end

Ability.Name: Lava Lash
Ability.Lua: if pow>=1600 and check(ll) then if AoE==false and sfc==5 then cast(gsi(ll)) end if AoE==true and (udbid(t,fs,p) or sfc==5) then cast(gsi(ll)) end end

Ability.Name: Fire Nova
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode~=0 and cd(fn)==0 and udbid(t,fs,p) then cast(gsi(fn)) end

Ability.Name: Unleashed Fury
Ability.Lua: if pow>=820 and check(ue) and inMelee==true and hasuf==true then cast(gsi(ue)) end

Ability.Name: SetSingle
Ability.Lua: AoE = false

Ability.Name: SetAoE
Ability.Lua: AoE = true

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and mwc > 1 and check(lb) and ubid(p,asc) then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Earth Shock
Ability.Lua: if check(es) then cast(gsi(es)) end

Ability.Name: Elemental Blast
Ability.Lua: if check(eb) and inMelee==true then cast(gsi(eb)) end

Ability.Name: Elemental Mastery
Ability.Lua: if check(em) and inMelee==true and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(em)) end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (5 Stacks)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and pow>=2840 and (mwc==5 or InMelee==false) and check(lb) then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (MW3 & UF DB & Asc)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and check(lb) and udbid(t,uf,p) and ubid(p,asc) and mwc >= 3 then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Ancestral Swiftness
Ability.Lua: if check(asw) and mwc < 2 then cast(gsi(asw)) end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (Asw)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and ubid(p,asw) and check(lb) then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Feral Spirit
Ability.Lua: if cd(fer)==0 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(fer)) end

Ability.Name: Spiritwalkers Grace
Ability.Lua: if check(sg) and PQR_IsMoving(1) and incom then cast(gsi(sg)) end

Ability.Name: Stormblast
Ability.Lua: if ubid(p,asb) and cd(sb)==0 then cast(gsi(sb),t) end

Ability.Name: Stormstrike
Ability.Lua: if pow>=3760 and check(ss) and not ubid(p,asb) then cast(gsi(ss),t) end if ubid(p,asb) and check(sb) then cast(gsi(sb),t) end

Ability.Name: Flame Shock (Unleashed Flame)
Ability.Lua: if pow>=1190 and check(fs) and ubid(p,ufl) and fsr < 7 then cast(gsi(fs)) end

Ability.Name: Flame Shock (Flame Shock Debuff)
Ability.Lua: if pow>=1190 and check(fs) and not udbid(t,fs,p) then cast(gsi(fs)) end

Ability.Name: Ghost Wolf
Ability.Lua: if sir(gsi(ll),t)~=1 and not ubid(p,gw) and not ubid(p,asc) and PQR_IsMoving(1) and cd(sg) > 0 and not ubid(p,sg) and not IsMounted() then cast(gsi(gw)) end if sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 and ubid(p,gw) then RunMacroText("/cancelform") end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (Spiritwalk)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and incom and ubid(p,sg) and check(lb) and sir(gsi(ll),t)~=1 then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Profession
Ability.Lua: if incom and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then --Synapse Springs if GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,10) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(10) end if GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,6) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(6) end end
